name: A Space Orb
description:
A Space Orb is a toy-like playful experience, which can be considered as a software toy, since it does not incorporate any built-in player goals. This mini game is created for Kubrick Archive Project of the MA Games Design course in UAL: London College of Communication. The film, 2001: A Space Odyssey (1968) was the major source of inspiration to this game. If you are interested in knowing more about the design and development process, please refer to the link below:

https://www.sukizilagac.com/blog
